name: Worms Worms Worms: AMAN Edition
description:
Grow and utilize your own personal worm army against the eldritch horrors of unknown origin. 

Cultivate 3 types of worms, Small - Medium - Large, all with 4 distinct upgrades each. Survive the ever increasingly difficult onslaught by carefully and strategically upgrading and deploying each worm type. Upgrades come in the form of deliveries via AMAN brand trucks, with 4 sellers - each with unique items that restock periodically. 

(not sponsored or associated with the AMAN market chain).
